insert into board (user_id, subject, content, hit, register_time, bullet) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now(),#{bullet})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select:
select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, b.bullet, u.user_name from board b, users u where b.user_id = u.user_id
order by b.bullet is NULL ASC, field(b.bullet,'공지','일반','글머리'), b.article_no desc limit #{start}, #{listsize}

mapper.select: select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, u.user_name from board b, users u where b.user_id = u.user_id and b.article_no = #{articleNo}
